summary: A craftable bucket to get rid of stuff you don\'t want, permanently.
descriptionHtml:
Ever get tired of dropping stuff you don\'t want and can\'t sell? It\'s awfully messy, isn\'t it? Well, now there\'s a Trash Bucket to make it all go away. Craft the bucket at any forge with 1 piece of firewood, click the misc item in your inventory, and behold as the bucket opens! Then, CAREFULLY, choose the items to be destroyed. Close the container and they\'ll be wiped from existence. No muss, no fuss, just POOF! Gone.

WARNING: Make a save before you use the bucket! Items placed in the bucket are erased next time you open it! AND YOU CANNOT GET THEM BACK! EVER!

Many thanks to IsharaMeradin at the Nexus forums for the scripting help.
author: Crysthala
